statements: SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Pending';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Completed';
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_id=1;
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY task_status DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_id > 100 ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_status, COUNT(*) FROM tasks GROUP BY task_status ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_status FROM tasks ORDER BY task_status ASC, task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC, task_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY task_id;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks INNER JOIN task_status ON tasks.task_status = task_status.status_name;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' OR task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tasks, task_status FROM tasks GROUP BY task_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaskStatus;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM TaskStatus ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT status, task_name FROM TaskStatus WHERE task_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignee WHERE assignee_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, assignee_name FROM TaskAssignee ORDER BY assignee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TaskStatus INNER JOIN TaskAssignee ON TaskStatus.task_id = TaskAssignee.task_id
SELECT task_name, status FROM TaskStatus WHERE status='Pending'
SELECT assignee_name, task_name, timestamp FROM TaskAssignee JOIN TaskHistory ON TaskAssignee.task_id = TaskHistory.task_id
SELECT task_id, COUNT(assignee_id) AS num_assignees FROM TaskAssignee GROUP BY task_id HAVING num_assignees > 1
SELECT task_name, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM TaskHistory JOIN TaskStatus ON TaskStatus.task_id = TaskHistory.task_id WHERE task_name LIKE 'Project%'
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM task_assignees WHERE assignee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM task_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT t.task_name, t.task_description, a.assignee_name FROM tasks t JOIN task_assignees a ON t.task_id = a.assignee_id WHERE t.task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY a.assignee_name ASC;
SELECT t.task_name, c.category_name FROM tasks t JOIN task_categories c ON t.task_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Development';
SELECT t.task_name, tl.log_description, tl.log_timestamp FROM tasks t JOIN task_logs tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id WHERE tl.log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY tl.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM task_status;
SELECT task_name, status FROM task_status WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, created_at FROM task_status ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT task_id, progress_percentage FROM task_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT task_id, assignee_name FROM task_assignee JOIN task_status ON task_assignee.task_id = task_status.id;
SELECT task_name, status FROM task_status WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT assignee_name, assigned_date FROM task_assignee ORDER BY assigned_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, progress_percentage, updated_at FROM task_status INNER JOIN task_progress ON task_status.id = task_progress.task_id WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT task_name, category_name FROM task_status INNER JOIN task_category ON task_status.id = task_category.task_id WHERE category_name LIKE '%development%';
SELECT * FROM task_priority WHERE priority_level = 'High' ORDER BY set_date ASC;
